arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Man United, Villa eyeing Palace's Eze
arts.sum: - Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim wants to sign Crystal Palace attacking midfielder Eberechi Eze, reports The Sun, although they add that there will be competition from Aston Villa if they are unable to keep Marcus Rashford . Manchester United want Eberechi Eze but face competition from Aston Villa, who will also propose a swap deal involving Marcus Rashford and Ollie Watkins .

arts.ttl: MOTD analysis: How Villa 'passed the Geordies on the left-hand side'
arts.sum: Former England footballer Dion Dublin analyses how Aston Villa "had done their homework" against Newcastle following their 4-1 win at Villa Park.

arts.ttl: Man United explore 'shock' Marcus Rashford swap deal that could harm Liverpool's transfer plans
arts.sum: Manchester United reportedly give consideration to an audacious Marcus Rashford swap transfer which could also have an impact on Liverpool.

arts.ttl: 'I was fuming': Ollie Watkins slams PSG snub as Emery hails positive reaction
arts.sum: Watkins was furious to be dropped but used the anger as motivation to come back stronger

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 4-1 Newcastle: What Jason Tindall said
arts.sum: Newcastle assistant manager Jason Tindall speaking to BBC Radio 5 Live: "On reflection over the 90 minutes Aston Villa deserved to win. From our perspective maybe a third game in six days caught up with us around about the hour is there. The effort is there. We can't lose sight of where we are."

arts.ttl: Ollie Watkins Left 'Fuming' at Unai Emery Over Marcus Rashford Villa Decision
arts.sum: Aston Villa forward Ollie Watkins has revealed he was recently left frustrated by Unai Emery's key decision in recent weeks, with Rashford involved.

arts.ttl: Villa's Watkins: I was 'fuming' at PSG benching
arts.sum: Recalled Aston Villa striker Ollie Watkins took out his anger on Newcastle United on Saturday with a dazzling display in his side's 4-1 victory in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Brilliant Villa boost European hopes - but who can qualify for what?
arts.sum: Aston Villa boost their Champions League hopes with victory over Newcastle, but who else is in the battle for the European places?

arts.ttl: Unai Emery happy with Ollie Watkinsâ€™ response to Europe anger as Aston Villa win
arts.sum: The long-serving 29-year-old started both legs of the quarter-final clash with the French champions on the bench.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa show off their key advantage to ignite Champions League charge
arts.sum: Aston Villa 4-1 Newcastle: Ollie Watkins ran the show as impressive and in-form Villa pulled away in the second half to give their Champions League hopes a big boost
